conclusion: The toy car (A) starts from the right side of the frame and moves towards the left, aiming at the cluster of blocks.
Car A first collides with the blue block, causing it to shift slightly and the car to lose some momentum.
After hitting the blue block, the car continues its movement and collides with the orange block located near the blue block, deflecting the car slightly upwards.
The car moves towards the yellow block but doesn't collide directly with it due to deflection.
The car continues its path and eventually hits the blue block again, pushing it further.
After multiple interactions, the car ends up near the center of the cluster, surrounded by the blocks.
The car stops between the blue block and the orange block, having lost most of its initial momentum.
Car A collides primarily with the blue and orange blocks and eventually stops near the center of the group of blocks, between the blue and orange blocks.
